data.actual_result: The message box stays on edit message ("Save"). Clicking on save clears the contents of the box, and changes it back to "Send"
data.expected_result: The message box should return to sending a new message (Button saying "Send"), and clear the contents of the box
data.short_description: You can still edit deleted messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message to any channel  - Tap and hold on the message - Click "Edit Message" - Change the text in the box provided. Don't save it! - Tap and hold on the message again - Click "Delete Message"
